answers.answer: Pizza and so much more gives me heartburn too but I try to keep the tums near and not lay down immediately after I eat and I be fine
Pizza! Sometimes I really want it though but then I get it and I remember I hate it now lol it makes me so sick
Hot cheetos ): I ate them everyday all day & now I don't like them /; & salmon too

Well I got gestational diabetes so now I can't eat cereal which is my favorite breakfast. I can't even eat healthy cereal my sugar goes way too high. Oh and cinnamon bread(take a piece of wheat bread put butter on it put sugar on it and cinnamon and use a butterknife to spread the cinnamon and sugar) its so good I hate it because my son loves to eat it for breakfast too.
I used to love Chinese food now it just grosses me out. I used to love eating hot cheetos now is just like uhhh heartburn
McDonalds , now I seriously hate it. Expect they fries tho.
Chicken :( can't stand the smell anymore
I miss cereal too ;( stupid diabetes. I used to eat buffalo wings alllll the time and now I'm just like bleh but I feel that way about a lot of meat now
Hotcheetos)': I miss them so much lol
raw onions, burgers, steak. used to eat them all the time now i think about them and i wanna barrffff.
I use to love pickles, mountain or pickles on subway but now I can only have a little or it grosses me out
Pickles, and soda. Can't stand either one anymore
Red meat gross me out . all greasy foods as well. Only cravings i have are chicken or fish as well as hot n sour stuff
Chocolate but i crave and can drink chocolate milk.

question: What food did you used to love before you got pregnant that you now cannot eat??? Mine is white castles. I loved white castles but now just the smell of it makes me so ughhhhhhh lol.
title: Food you used to love....
